statements.query: MATCH (human:Human), (guser:GSuiteUser) WHERE human.email = guser.email MERGE (human)-[r:IDENTITY_GSUITE]->(guser) ON CREATE SET r.firstseen = {UPDATE_TAG} SET r.lastupdated = {UPDATE_TAG}
MATCH (:Human)-[r:IDENTITY_GSUITE]->(:GSuiteUser) WHERE r.lastupdated <> {UPDATE_TAG} WITH r LIMIT {LIMIT_SIZE} DELETE (r) return COUNT(*) as TotalCompleted
